question.title: MockServer json() method - import location
question.body:
In the following code from https://github.com/mock-server/mockserver/issues/601

 return request().withMethod("POST")
                .withBody(json(body, MatchType.STRICT))
                .withPath(UriBuilder.fromPath(basePath)
                                    .path("v1/jobs/{arg1}/savepoints")
                             
                                    .toString());

What is the import for the json(String, MatchType) method?

Checked documentation at https://5-2.mock-server.com/mock_server/creating_expectations_request_matchers.html
